pages.text: A reactant is a chemical substance that you can use inside your Reactor to sustain a nuclear reaction.$(br2)There are two types of reactant:$(li)$(bold)Fuel:$() literally, the fuel that sustain the nuclear chain reaction inside the $(l:reactor/part-fuelrod)Fuel Rods$(/l)$(li)$(bold)Waste:$() the product of the reaction that consume the fuel once it's irradiated.

Extreme Reactors register, by default, two reactants: a fuel named Yellorium and it's associated waste, Cyanite.$(br2)Every reactants has a list of items that can be used to produce that reactant by, for example, inserting then in a $(l:reactor/part-solidaccessport)Access Port$(/l).$(br2)Yellorium, for example, can be obtained from $(l:intro/ores)Yellorium Ingots$(/l). Cyanite, when ejected from the Reactor, turn into Cyanite Ingots.
Other mods or mod packs can add their own reactants and reactants source or modify/remove the default ones.
